This is bad. Lok is... was... the epitome of evil. He murdered Balder and nearly destroyed the world!

If his cultists somehow restore him to life, the entire world will fall into chaos and ruin!"What can I do to stop this?"
<PCNAME> destroyed the weapons the cult of Lok were supplying to the devas, and found more in their inner sanctum.

It's hard to say. Certainly, we can attack Lok's cultists...cut them off from the devan raiders.

Clearly, the cultists are supplying the devas with weapons and using them as shock troops, so we need to destroy their armory.

I'll work on finding hard proof of cultists' involvement, so Hendry can show it to the garrison commander in Velika.

Meanwhile, you should go destroy those weapons! Come find me at the crossroads when you're done."I'm on it."

Look...over there in the sanctuary!

Cultists!

Kantusa was right. The cultists are working with the devas to destabilize Oblivion Woods.

We might never have learned about this without her sacrifice.
